titles.title: National Child Hunger Relief Act
A bill to require semiannual indexing of certain Federal child nutrition programs.
National Child Hunger Relief Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: National Child Hunger Relief Act - Amends the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to provide semiannual reimbursement rate adjustments for: (1) national school lunch and breakfast programs; (2) the special milk program; (3) the child and adult day care program; and (4) the summer food service program.
